name: Bustout
description:
Bustout is a challenging platformer made by FortySix with a 24 hour deadline.

You are a little gear that tries to escape a machine and explore the real world. Avoid classic platformer hazards and try not to get overrolled by the machine.

Controls:

  • AD to move
  • Space to jump
  • R to restart the level

Known bugs:

  • Sometimes it might occur that you jump very high, although the jump is, in most cases, very consistent. I had no more time to fix this issue.

This game was inspired by one of my previous games; Between Dreams. Both games are relatively similar, although I tried going into a different atmospheric vibe.

I hope you all enjoy it!
